# Exploratory data analysis

## Data Inspection
```{r}
# Missing Value
check_na <- is.na(userdataset)
sum(check_na)
head(userdataset,10)

# Replace some columns' type
userdataset[,2] <- as.character(userdataset[,2])
userdataset[,"country"]<- as.factor(userdataset[,"country"])
userdataset[,"hasAnyApp"]<- as.factor(userdataset[,"hasAnyApp"])
userdataset[,"gender"]<- as.factor(userdataset[,"gender"])
userdataset[,"hasAndroidApp"]<- as.factor(userdataset[,"hasAndroidApp"])
userdataset[,"hasIosApp"]<- as.factor(userdataset[,"hasIosApp"])

summary(userdataset[,-1])
###difference between 'summary(userdataset)' and 'summary(userdataset[,-1])' is lack "index".

# Delete the duplicate colums
###删除useless的元数据"identifierHash","type"; 删除重复列"country", "seniorityAsYears", "seniorityAsMonths", "civilityGenderId"。
userds <- userdataset[,!colnames(userdataset) %in% c("identifierHash","type","country","seniorityAsYears","seniorityAsMonths", "civilityGenderId") ]


```
